articles.description: Animated tale of a man’s soul trying to reunite with his body is gorgeous but frustrating.
articles.content: Admittedly, though, Soul gives the audience a fabulous tour guide to its woozy outer reaches. Joe (Jamie Foxx) is a middle-school band teacher, trying to coax a melody out of his clangily dissonant e… [+3892 chars]
